parameters: ?t - truck: the truck to load the package into
?l - location: the location where the package and the truck are
Load a package into a truck.action_desc: This action enables the agent to load a package into a truck. For example, load a package_1 into a truck_1.
translated_preconditions: the package ?p is at the location ?l
the truck ?t is at the same location ?l
the package ?p is not in the truck ?t
translated_effects: the package ?p is not at the location ?l
the package ?p is in the truck ?t

parameters: ?t - truck: the truck from which the package is to be unloaded
?l - location: the location where the package is to be unloaded
Unload a package from a truck.action_desc: This action enables the agent to unload a package from a truck. For example, unload a package_1 from a truck_1.
translated_preconditions: the package ?p is in the truck ?t
the truck ?t is at the location ?l
translated_effects: the package ?p is not in the truck ?t
the package ?p is at the location ?l

parameters: ?a - plane: the airplane to load the package into
?l - location: the location where the loading takes place
Load a package into an airplane.action_desc: This action enables the agent to load a package into an airplane. For example, load a package_1 into an airplane_1.
translated_preconditions: the package ?p is at the location ?l
the airplane ?a is at the same location ?l
translated_effects: the package ?p is not at the location ?l
the package ?p is in the airplane ?a

parameters: ?a - plane: the airplane from which the package is to be unloaded
?l - location: the location where the airplane is and where the package will be unloaded
Unload a package from an airplane.action_desc: This action enables the agent to unload a package from an airplane. For example, unload a package_1 from an airplane_1.
translated_preconditions: the airplane ?a is at the location ?l
the package ?p is in the airplane ?a
translated_effects: the package ?p is not in the airplane ?a
the package ?p is at the location ?l

parameters: ?t - truck: the truck to be driven
?from - location: the location from where the truck will be driven
?to - location: the location to where the truck will be driven
?c - city: the city in which the truck is being driven
Drive a truck from one location to anoth.action_desc: This action enables the agent to drive a truck from one location to another in a city. For example, drive a truck_1 from location_1 to location_2 in city_1.
translated_preconditions: the truck ?t is at the location ?from
the truck ?t is in a city
translated_effects: the truck ?t is not at the location ?from
the truck ?t is at the location ?to

parameters: ?from - location: the location to fly from
?to - location: the location to fly to
Fly an airplane from one city to another.action_desc: This action enables the agent to fly an airplane from one city's airport to another. The airports are locations in the city. For example, fly an airplane_1 from location_0 to location_1.
translated_preconditions: the airplane ?a is at the location ?from
translated_effects: the airplane ?a is not at the location ?from
the airplane ?a is at the location ?to
